column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////There's a lot of options
column3: but the names aren't very telling.  Lucky for us
column4: we had a waiter that knew all the drinks and was able to recommend the right one based on what you're looking for (i.e. fruity
column8: and it was really good - generous pour of alcohol
column9: but it didn't taste like rubbing alcohol.
